topic.title: What's new in Release 17
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 17.

note.item: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Kanban WIP Limits
section.p: Limit work in progress by setting limits on swimlanes in the grid view.
This feature comes out of the box with the Kanban template, but can be configured on any other sort of project too!
Read how to configure WIP limits. Also, check out our blogpost on WIP limits.

section.title: Easy Charts
section.p: Setting up charts to track and report progress has never been easier!

Reporting is one of Mingle’s most powerful features - you can create hundreds of customized charts and reports. Easy Charts introduces a wizard to make customization easier than ever. Just a few clicks, and you’ll be all set up.
Further, you can now get more information from the charts simply by hovering and clicking on the sections you’re interested in.
